description: Data: Retrieve stations, data types and measurements in a hierarchical form: stationtype/station/datatype/measurement
Data: Retrieve stations, data types and measurements in a flattened form: Useful for aggregation and retrieval of subsets of data
Data: Retrieve edges in a hierarchical form: Useful when you want to see which stations are connected in a graph
Data: Retrieve edges in a flattened form: Useful when you want to see which stations are connected in a graph
The API specification in an OpenAPI v3 Yaml format
